title: Botulism outbreak sickens more than 50 babies and expands to all ByHeart products
description: Federal health officials expanded an infant botulism outbreak tied to recalled ByHeart baby formula to include all illnesses reported since the company began production in March 2022.
content: Federal health officials expanded an infant botulism outbreak tied to recalled ByHeart baby formula to include all illnesses reported since the company began production in March 2022.
